voiceover.script: Born in 1966 or 2026? You're a Fire Horse — The Untamable Spirit. You are fire doubled — the Horse's wild independence amplified by Fire's relentless drive. Where other signs calculate or defer, you charge forward on pure instinct and conviction. Your core strength: Fearless authenticity. But watch out for your shadow side: Explosive volatility. Your best match? Earth Goat — your passion creates their stability, and they ground you without constraining your spirit. Get your full reading at wuxing zodiac dot me.
